intro: Witheringia rubra, commonly known as the red witheringia, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 12,000 species of flowering plants. Witheringia rubra is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and greenhouses due to its striking appearance.
